subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Tests and Testing
Baseball
Cocaine and Crack Cocaine
lead_paragraph: Rangers Manager Ron Washington said he tested positive for cocaine in 2009 under a program that managers, coaches and personnel have been subjected to since the release of the Mitchell report.
snippet: Rangers Manager Ron Washington said he tested positive for cocaine in 2009 under a program that managers, coaches and personnel have been subjected to since the release of the Mitchell report.
